supplier_of: electronic fruit graders | fruit sorters | mechanical fruit grader | sorting and sizing equipment for fruits and vegetables | packing and packaging - machinery and equipment | couplings | vegetable graders | weight sizer | diameter sizer | vegetable sorters | mechanical grader | mechanical cherry graders | cherry cluster separator | electronic weight sizer | electronic apple sizers
information: We have been manufacturing quality, precision graders for over 50 years. We supply arboriculture equipment. The company is based in the heart of a prized apple-growing region, and quickly built up a reputation for being a serious company attentive to its customers' needs. It expanded quickly and diversified into sorting fruit and vegetables, coming up with a constant stream of innovative, high quality products. We have a comprehensive range of machines and equipment for fruit and vegetable growers: electronic diameter sizers, electronic weight sizers, mechanical graders, cherry stalk separators and many other accessories (brushing machines, pallet box emptiers, water dumpers, fillers, etc.). It is gratifying that our machines are operating in France, as well as the USA, Canada, Chile, Spain, Italy, Germany, Switzerland, Norway and beyond.
keywords: Sorting and sizing equipment for fruits and vegetables, Packing and packaging - machinery and equipment, couplings, electronic fruit graders, vegetable graders, weight sizer, Diameter sizer, Fruit sorters, Vegetable sorters, mechanical grader
